728422f-a.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Futurity Place
728422f-a.text:
Arthur Kill Road, south side, between
Futurity Place and Token Street, showing the
ruins of the Bedell Home. The house was built
in 1670.
Aboot 1905 (7)
By Eugene C. Putnam
From Staten Island Museum Collection through P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728422f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Futurity Place, Staten Island, NY
